definition: apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc
stick/pole/lever/classifier for long objects such as guns

sentences.english: The location of the ejector pin elements, and the number used, is dependent on the components size and shape.
sentences.chinese: 顶杆零件的位置和数目，取决于塑件的尺寸和形状。

sentences.english: The plain diameter ejector pin may be used in one of two ways.
sentences.chinese: 普通的顶杆可以有两种使用方法。

sentences.english: The mandril connecting structure is arranged on the jetting joint of the air bottle nozzle.
sentences.chinese: 所述气瓶嘴的喷射接口上设置有顶杆连接结构。

sentences.english: Suitable sizes of push-back pins may be selected from a standard ejector pin range.
sentences.chinese: 回程杆的合适尺寸可以在标准的顶杆范围内选择。

sentences.english: The direction of movement of this ejector pin is, therefore, controlled by this hole.
sentences.chinese: 因此顶杆的运动方向由这个孔来控制。

sentences.english: Ejectors eject the molded parts. In this case, the safety of the returning ejector should be ensured.
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况下，必须确保顶杆复位的安全性。

sentences.english: Each ejector pin diameter has a number of different lengths associated with it.
sentences.chinese: 每一种顶杆直径有许多不同长度。

definition: nut (female component of nut and bolt)
bolt (male component of nut and bolt)/screw
